decks.notes: This deck focuses on using counters and artifacts to buff up creatures quickly and overwhelm the opponent. Cards like Hardened Scales and Urza's Saga help generate additional value from +1/+1 counters, while cards like Zabaz, the Glimmerwasp and Arcbound Ravager can easily become huge threats. The deck also includes ways to protect its key pieces, such as Welding Jar and Pithing Needle. By rapidly increasing the power and toughness of its creatures, this deck aims to quickly close out the game before the opponent has a chance to respond.

This deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage as efficiently as possible. By including Jegantha as a companion, it ensures that the deck has access to a consistent mana source. The inclusion of aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, Wild Nacatl, and Territorial Kavu, paired with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames, allows for a fast and aggressive playstyle. The deck also includes Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact to provide additional protection and support for its creatures.

The deck focuses on using instant-speed reanimation spells like Goryo's Vengeance to cheat big creatures like Griselbrand and Fallaji Archaeologist onto the battlefield. It also utilizes cards like Solitude and Grief to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The combination of Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Tainted Indulgence can provide additional value and card advantage. The strategy involves quickly assembling the combo pieces and overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures and disruptive spells. The deck aims to win through a combination of aggression and control, using reanimation spells and creature interactions to dominate the board.
